body.name: KitchenCraft Living Nostalgia Table-Top Dustpan and Brush Set, 16 x 11 x 14 cm (6.5" x 4.5" x 5.5")
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 hrs 48 mins
features: Mini dustpan and brush set inspired by vintage practicality, ideal for quick table and worktop clean-ups before and after dinner
Brush's firm bristles and stainless steel dustpan's graduated lip mean you can sweep and collect all dirt, dust and crumbs with ease
Brush features a soft-close magnet which keeps both items together for compact storage, (This means less chance of one going missing)
Co-ordinates delightfully with other items from KitchenCraft's Living Nostalgia collection

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Living Nostalgia Table-Top Dustpan and Brush Set Robust and Practical The KitchenCraft Living Nostalgia Table-Top Dustpan and Brush Set is ideal for quick after-dinner clean-ups. With the brush's firm bristles you can easily sweep crumbs from tabletops and kitchen counters to keep them spotless. And its clever magnetic design means it stores away neatly too. Like all products from the Living Nostalgia collection, this mini dustpan and brush set is inspired by the understated elegance and practicality of housewares from a bygone era. The brush features a beautiful natural wood handle designed to provide you with a comfortable grip, while the dustpan is made from shimmering stainless steel. It’s the ideal accessory for anyone who takes pride in keeping their house just perfect. Made of durable stainless steel, this tabletop dustpan is ideal for everyday use. And with its graduated lip, you can rest assured all of the dust, dirt and crumbs you sweep up will end up in the pan – not on the floor! Useful Information Measures 16 x 11 x 4 cm (6¼ in x 4¼ in x 1½ in) when stored together Dustpan can be wiped down after use

Integrated Magnet for Convenient Storage When you've finished tidying up, you can neatly attach the brush to the dustpan with its integral magnet. This compact, space-saving design makes it easy to keep the set together while stored away in a drawer or cupboard.

More from KitchenCraft Living Nostalgia Spring clean or everyday housekeeping, KitchenCraft’s Living Nostalgia collection helps keep your house spotlessly tidy. Why not match your dustpan and brush with the 30-litre pedal bin, available in Living Nostalgia's three vintage-inspired colours – French Grey (LNBIN30GRY), Antique Cream (LNBIN30CRE) and Vintage Blue (LNBIN30BLU)? reviews.reviewText: love this! no plastic! I did have to re glue the magnet in when I got it, but it only took a minute. I use this all over the house and car and find it really convenient.

reviews.reviewText: A little more expensive than the other options I was looking at but I am glad I got this one. The quality is great. Utility is great. I love the magnet. I love the density of the Brush.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seemingly random but it’s so perfect
reviews.reviewText: In restaurants people use this and it’s so useful. I was tired of crumbs and this is classy and simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fake country charm.
reviews.reviewText: My work surface us covered by a self healing cutting mat and a large poly cutting board on which I generate thread and leather scraps. The size of this is just right for my area as is having something like this to help keep work surfaces clean.This cost more than some other options, has s/s pan, a fake silkscreened on charm and natural fiber brush. I thought in total there was a chance this was not manuf in China, but wrong.In use, of the pieces of thread and leather bits I try to sweep up many just won’t budge from the work surface. Angling the ends if the bristles in the direction I’m sweeping works but results in bristles bending outwards. Yes there’s a static charge issue here but in the past I’ve had products without the charm (read plastic) that worked much better. Others have rated this product well but my experience is equally valid. My opinion, no I would not recommend this and wished I made a purely utilitarian choice that actually worked much better.
vraiment idéal pour ramasser les miettes sur la table avec une touche esthétique car pas un simple objet en plastique

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use it daily. Very functional, compact and well designed for clearing crumbs from worktops and table etc. Mag net design keeps it neat and tidy and easy stored.
Para mi es perfecto para recoger las migas de la mesa, además es bonito.

In realtà cercavo con leggera disperazione una "paletta" con 3 bordi alti per raccogliere e spostare alimenti tagliati sul tagliere.Questa, anche se nata per un altro scopo, è perfetta!!! È di ottima qualità, frequenti lavaggi (risciacqui) non lasciano segni, sono soddisfattissima dell'acquisto!
they are good working together.well made!
